name: Elizabeth Vyka
text: I get the same mini pizza made for me in about 10 minutes. The young people that work here are genuinely nice. They have a small eat in area. Chester's chicken is just the next counter over. Both are consistent in being fresh and tasty. I love fried okra too.

name: Michelle Barrett
text: The pizza is good and the service is very good. I suggest ordering ahead for anything other than a personal pizza. Personal pizzas are always hot and ready. The wait for a large is ten to fifteen minutes. We usually order our pizza, then â€¦More

name: Sherry Charley
text: Delicious to drive to Loves to have a personal size made just for me.

name: Blob Jelly
text: A lot of people say come and go has the most bombass pizza. I would say godfather's is better than it

name: Amani
text: The pizza is great!! I enjoyed my meal, but for some odd reason, I felt like my food tasted a little off. After it cooled off for a while the taste went away.

name: Christina Hernandez
text: Pizza was good. They usually make it better. Only downfall was they said 20 min so I made it there in 25. But still had to wait 10 more min for one of the pizzas to come out. So the other one ended up being kinda cold by the time I got home. But its attached to a huge truck stop gas station so they do get pretty busy

name: RocketMan23900
text: Good pizza for on the go

name: Chris
text: Good service

name: Joanna Butterfield
text: Conveniently located inside of Love's. Made to order pizzas and some ready to go. My family loves their pizza, it's so good.

name: Richard Martin
text: Great pizza

name: Joshua St. Germain
text: good fast food option.

name: Micha Martinez
text: This is my own opinion.   There are people who love this pizza and there is me who think it's okay.

name: Renee Knibbs
text: Service good, restaurant clean, pizza is good.

name: Justin Johnson
text: I thought the point of having a pizza place in a gas station was to always have food ready for the traveler that's in a rush.  There was no pizzas up and it was 8 pm.  There was some other types of food but I went to a pizza joint wanting pizza.  Get it together imo.

name: Kendra Rowin
text: Pizza reminded me of a little hometown mom and pop pizza place, loved it. Deff be back

name: S Payton
text: Overcooked pizza. Good garlic bread though.

name: johnnie chacon
text: Nothing special about thos place pizza is below average in my opinion and never has any variety to the store wouldnt eat here!

name: Tia White
text: Depends on how fresh the pizza is when you purchase it

name: Rudy Martinez
text: Rajon Cajun  Pizza is my favorite

name: Aaron Huizar
text: Great tasting Pizza always fresh around lunchtime
